tool_description: Creates optimized timing schedules for multi-channel donor communication campaigns based on donor preferences, historical engagement data, and campaign objectives.

campaign_name.description: Name identifier for the campaign being scheduled

channels.description: Communication channels to include: email, direct_mail, social_media, phone, event

frequency.description: Contact frequency: daily, weekly, biweekly, monthly, or custom

priority_days.description: Preferred days of week for outreach (monday, tuesday, etc.)

avoid_holidays.description: Whether to avoid scheduling communications on holidays

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be before end_date and both must be in valid date-time format.
Unsupported channel: channels must contain only valid options: email, direct_mail, social_media, phone, event.
Invalid frequency: frequency must be one of: daily, weekly, biweekly, monthly, custom.
Invalid day specification: priority_days must contain valid weekday names.
Schedule conflict: The requested schedule conflicts with existing campaigns or system maintenance windows.
usage: Provide campaign_name, start_date, end_date, channels array, and frequency. Optionally specify priority_days and avoid_holidays setting. Returns an optimized schedule with recommended send times.

total_touchpoints.description: Total number of planned communication touchpoints

send_dates.description: Array of scheduled send dates in date-time format

channel_distribution.description: Summary of how communications are distributed across channels

optimization_notes.description: Notes about schedule optimizations and recommendations
